company_registration_part1: Green Nation, a company registered with the Paris Trade and Companies Register under number 953371085, and listed in the Single Register of Insurance, Banking, and Finance Intermediaries under registration number 23007580 as a non-exclusive agent in banking operations and payment services.
legal_text: This Visa card is issued by UAB StanHope under a license granted by VISA Europe Limited. UAB StanHope is authorized and regulated by the Bank of Lithuania as an electronic money institution under the Law of the Republic of Lithuania on Electronic Money and Electronic Money Institutions for the issuance of electronic money (AC: LB002039).
call_confirmed_message: Your appointment with your Green Nation Account Manager is confirmed.
call_details_message: During the call, you can ask your questions and get support with your account, transactions, or any specific needs.
reschedule_message: Need to reschedule or cancel? You can do it anytime within the app.
